title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 434.2 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 228.83 was recorded at Year 2008
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2008 to 2012.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2013 to 2015.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2016.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2013.
